normalised: **E V Charging Gets a Desi Tadka!**

unnormalised: Hey petrolheads, time to say *namaste* to more EV charging stations popping up! Finally, no more range anxiety during your long drives from Delhi to Agra.
normalised: Hey petrolheads, time to say *namaste* to more E V charging stations popping up! Finally, no more range anxiety during your long drives from Delhi to Agra.

unnormalised: Tata Power just announced a massive rollout plan, aiming for charging points every 50 km on major highways. Imagine reaching that *dhaba* and juicing up your Nexon EV while enjoying some spicy biryani – pure bliss!
normalised: Tata Power just announced a massive rollout plan, aiming for charging points every fifty kilometer on major highways. Imagine reaching that *dhaba* and juicing up your Nexon E V while enjoying some spicy biryani – pure bliss!

unnormalised: And speaking of bliss, Ather Energy is also expanding rapidly, especially down South. Expect to see them everywhere during Onam season in Kerala.
normalised: And speaking of bliss, Ather Energy is also expanding rapidly, especially down South. Expect to see them everywhere during Onam season in Kerala.

unnormalised: IIT Madras researchers are working on faster charging tech too. They're aiming to drastically cut down charging times – think refuelling faster than you can finish a filter coffee!
normalised: I I T Madras researchers are working on faster charging tech too. They are aiming to drastically cut down charging times – think refuelling faster than you can finish a filter coffee!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the government is offering subsidies – around Rs. 10,000 - to encourage folks to install chargers at home.
normalised: Meanwhile, the government is offering subsidies – around rupee ten thousand - to encourage folks to install chargers at home.

unnormalised: So, whether you're cruising down the Mumbai-Pune expressway or exploring the backroads of Rajasthan, finding an EV charger is becoming less of a headache. The future is electric, and it's looking brighter than Diwali lights!
normalised: So, whether you are cruising down the Mumbai-Pune expressway or exploring the backroads of Rajasthan, finding an E V charger is becoming less of a headache. The future is electric, and it is looking brighter than Diwali lights!
